name: 王維周
objective: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容 :1.建築再利用之導論與定義； 2.建築再利用的主要理論與手法；3. 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討；4. 建築填充體的更新 ；5. 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築 主體的增建與減建；6.外部裝修的保存與再利用；7. 建築資材的他用途轉用；8.建築再利用與都市更新；9. 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)。
schedule:
1  Presentation of course
2  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (I) – change of ideas on protection of cultural heritage through preservation : the case of France
3  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (II) – Authenticity on restoration
4  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (III) – laws and system
5  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (IV) – World Heritage: change on meanings and concepts
6  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (V) – discussion on in situ: musems
7  Conservation/Preservation of Cultural Heritage (VI) – Industrial heriage
8  Fieldwork
9  1° report
10  Architectural composition
11  Growing architecture
12  Co-Living with history – Pierre Prunet, Reichen & Robert, Bernard Huet....etc.
13  The idea on « New »
14  Carlo Scarpa and his architecture
15  Dimistri Pikionis and his architecture
16  The case of Taiwan : 
17  2° report –I 
18  2° report – II Final

Attendance to class and participation: 40%
Reports: 60%
